channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: I am a German lawyer, software engineer, and data scientist.

item.title: Thinking in React Hooks
item.description: “Thinking in React” is a corner stone of the React documentation. This post shows how to implement the example using modern React, i.e. functional components and hooks.

item.title: How to train a fastai model and run it on iOS
item.description: This post covers an end-to-end example project of training a resnet model with fastai and PyTorch, converting it to CoreML and running it inside a react-native iOS app.

item.title: How to train a fastai model and run it in the browser
item.description: This post covers an end-to-end example project of training a resnet model with fastai and PyTorch, exporting it to ONNX and running it in the browser inside a React.js app.

item.title: Understanding and Building a GraphQL Server
item.description: If you are trying to build a GraphQL server today, you don’t have much choice: You pretty much have to use the reference implementation graphql-js. The problem is, though, that there is almost no documentation for it, yet.
